channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan Reveals Five New Cabinet Ministers for Incoming Administration
item.description: Taiwan's incoming Lai Ching-te administration has revealed its picks for interior, transportation, justice, education and culture ministers.

item.title: Suspected Arson Attack in Taichung Leaves Three Dead, One Injured
item.description: Three people are dead and one injured following a suspected arson attack in Taichung. Investigators say it could be linked to a dispute over a property sale.

item.title: Celebrity Abuse Scandal Sparks Debate Over Taiwan's Child Pornography Laws
item.description: Legislators in Taiwan are debating the effectiveness of laws meant to prevent and punish the sale of child pornography following a sex abuse scandal involving celebrity Mickey Huan

item.title: Taiwanese American College Student Invents App To Preserve Taiwanese Hokkien
item.description: Taiwanese Hokkien was the dominant language in Taiwan until Mandarin Chinese was brought over and enforced as the national language at the end of the Chinese Civil War in 1949. Tai
